packages.title: Basic Logo Package
packages.shortDesc: Perfect for small businesses needing a clean and simple logo.
packages.fullDesc: This package includes 2 initial logo concepts, 2 revisions, color palette selection, and delivery in multiple formats. Ideal for startups and small brands.

packages.title: Brand Identity Package
packages.shortDesc: A complete branding system with modern, professional designs.
packages.fullDesc: Includes 4 logo concepts, multiple revisions, brand guidelines, social media kit, and business card design. Perfect for brands wanting recognition and consistency.

packages.title: Premium Branding Suite
packages.shortDesc: Full brand transformation with advanced design elements.
packages.fullDesc: Complete branding identity including illustrations, custom icon pack, full stationery design, packaging concepts, and visual brand storytelling.

projects.name: Startup Branding Suite
projects.shortDesc: A fresh and modern identity designed for a tech startup.

projects.name: Cafe Logo & Packaging
projects.shortDesc: Complete branding for a cafe including logo + packaging.

projects.name: Corporate Brand Redesign
projects.shortDesc: Full rebrand including guidelines and marketing materials.
